column2: “No  Magistrate  or  Police  Officer  shall  be  compelled  to  say
whence  he  got  the  information  as  to  the  commission  of  any

Section 125 of the Evidence Ordinance re: offence,  and  no  revenue  officer  shall  be  compelled

column2: whence  he  got  any  information  as  to  the  commission  of  any

Section 125 of the Evidence Ordinance re: offence against the public revenue or the excise laws.”
